fcxdesc:
-[ FIX ] Piccolo when dying in base state appeared without the cape
-[ FIX ] Golden Metal Cooler had 2 less powers, now he has regeneration.
[ FIX ] The aiming of the laser (freezer ,cooler, etc) the crosshair was wrong.
[ FIX ] Position of the gallitgun aura in baby vegeta.
-[ FIX BUG ] The player affected with the ginyu change, then could not transform.
-Some description files were missing on boss maps
-[ FIX ] Fixed some music from the music menu (H)
launcherdescription:

-Button to go to the game folder
